name: fsj
description: Convert a file tree to a json blob

scripts.prepublish: node -e "util = require('util'); fs = require('fs'); var cli = fs.readFileSync('help.txt'), readme = fs.readFileSync('README.template.md', 'utf8'); process.stdout.write(util.format(readme, cli))" > README.md

author: Andrew <andywinterman@gmail.com>
